metadata.title: CVE-2005-2335

platform: SUSE CORE 9 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE CORE 9 for Itanium Processor Family

metadata.description: Buffer overflow in the POP3 client in Fetchmail before 6.2.5.2 allows remote POP3 servers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code via long UIDL responses.  NOTE: a typo in an advisory accidentally used the wrong CVE identifier for the Fetchmail issue. This is the correct identifier.
